sentences.zh: 中宮天極星，其一明者，太一常居也；

translations.literal: Central Palace Heaven's Pole star, its one bright one, Tai Yi constantly resides;
translations.idiomatic: The Central Palace's Pole Star—its single bright star—is where Taiyi permanently resides.

translations.literal: Beside it, three stars represent the Three Dukes, or sometimes called the imperial heirs.

sentences.zh: 後句四星，末大星正妃，餘三星後宮之屬也。

translations.literal: Behind them, four curved stars: the final large star is the chief consort, the other three are attendants of the rear palace.
Surrounding them, twelve guardian stars serve as feudal ministers.
All together are called the Purple Palace.

Central Palace Heaven's Pole star, its one bright one, Tai Yi constantly resides; Beside three stars three dukes, or called son attendants. Back curved four stars, last big star chief consort, remaining three stars rear palace attendants. Surrounding barrier guard twelve stars, feudal ministers. All called Purple Palace.

sentences.zh: 前列直斗口三星，隨北端兌，若見若不，曰陰德，或曰天一。

translations.literal: In the front row, three stars at the Dipper's mouth follow the northern end of the Dui trigram, appearing and disappearing intermittently. They are called Yin Virtue, or sometimes Tianyi.

sentences.zh: 紫宮左三星曰天槍，右五星曰天棓，後六星絕漢抵營室，曰閣道。

translations.literal: To the left of the Purple Palace, three stars are called Heaven's Spear; to the right, five stars are called Heaven's Club; behind them, six stars cross the Milky Way to reach the Encampment Chamber, called the Pavilion Road.

Front row straight Dipper mouth three stars, follow north end Dui, appear not appear, called Yin Virtue, or called Tian Yi. Purple Palace left three stars called Heaven Spear, right five stars called Heaven Club, back six stars cross Milky Way reach Camp Room, called Pavilion Way.

sentences.zh: 北斗七星，所謂「旋、璣、玉衡以齊七政」。

translations.literal: North Dipper seven stars, what is called 'Xuan Ji Yu Heng to align seven governance'.
translations.idiomatic: The seven stars of the Northern Dipper are what is meant by: "Xuan Ji Yu Heng align the seven celestial bodies."

sentences.zh: 杓攜龍角，衡殷南斗，魁枕參首。

translations.literal: The ladle carries the Dragon's horn, the balance presses on the Southern Dipper, the handle pillows Orion's head.
Use dusk establish ladle;
translations.idiomatic: The ladle is used for establishing direction at dusk.

translations.literal: The ladle points from China southwestward.
Night half establish balance;
translations.idiomatic: The balance is used for establishing direction at midnight.

translations.literal: The balance points to the central states between the Yellow River and Ji River.
Level dawn establish handle;
translations.idiomatic: The handle is used for establishing direction at dawn.

translations.literal: The handle points to the northeast beyond the Tai and Dai mountains.

sentences.zh: 斗為帝車，運于中央，臨制四鄉。

translations.literal: The Dipper serves as the Emperor's carriage, moving at the center and overseeing the four directions.

sentences.zh: 分陰陽，建四時，均五行，移節度，定諸紀，皆系於斗。

translations.literal: It divides yin and yang, establishes the four seasons, balances the five phases, shifts the measures, and determines all records—all are tied to the Dipper.

North Dipper seven stars, what is called 'Xuan Ji Yu Heng to align seven governance'. Ladle carries Dragon horn, balance presses Southern Dipper, handle pillows Shen head. Use dusk establish ladle; Ladle, from China southwest. Night half establish balance; Balance, Yin central states He Ji between. Level dawn establish handle; Handle, Hai Dai northeast. Dipper is Emperor carriage, moves at center, overlooks controls four directions. Divides yin yang, establishes four seasons, equalizes five phases, shifts measures, determines various records, all tied to Dipper.

sentences.zh: 斗魁戴匡六星曰文昌宮：一曰上將，二曰次將，三曰貴相，四曰司命，五曰司中，六曰司祿。

translations.literal: Dipper handle wears barrier six stars called Wen Chang Palace: one called Upper General, two called Vice General, three called Noble Chancellor, four called Si Ming, five called Si Zhong, six called Si Lu.
translations.idiomatic: The six stars worn by the Dipper handle like a crown form the Wen Chang Palace: the first is the Senior General, second the Junior General, third the Noble Chancellor, fourth the Controller of Fate, fifth the Controller of the Center, sixth the Controller of Salaries.

translations.literal: In Dipper handle midst, noble person's prison.
translations.idiomatic: Within the Dipper handle lies the noble person's prison.

sentences.zh: 魁下六星，兩兩相比者，名曰三能。

translations.literal: Below the handle, six stars paired in opposition are called the Three Neng.
Three Neng color even, ruler minister harmonious;
translations.idiomatic: When the Three Neng are evenly colored, ruler and ministers are harmonious.

translations.literal: When uneven, they become perverse and contrary.
Auxiliary star bright close, auxiliary minister intimate strong;
translations.idiomatic: When the auxiliary stars are bright and close, auxiliary ministers are intimate and strong.

translations.literal: When distant and dim, they are estranged and weak.

Dipper handle wears barrier six stars called Wen Chang Palace: one called Upper General, two called Vice General, three called Noble Chancellor, four called Si Ming, five called Si Zhong, six called Si Lu. In Dipper handle midst, noble person's prison. Handle below six stars, two two compared, named Three Neng. Three Neng color even, ruler minister harmonious; Not even, become contrary perverse. Auxiliary star bright close, auxiliary minister intimate strong; Distant small, distant weak.

sentences.zh: 杓端有兩星：一內為矛，招搖；

translations.literal: Ladle end has two stars: one inner spear, Zhao Yao;
translations.idiomatic: At the ladle's end are two stars: the inner one is the spear, Zhaoyao.

translations.literal: The outer one is the shield, Tianfeng.

sentences.zh: 有句圜十五星，屬杓，曰賤人之牢。

translations.literal: Has curved circle fifteen stars, belongs ladle, called lowly person's prison.
translations.idiomatic: There are fifteen stars in a curved circle belonging to the ladle, called the lowly person's prison.

sentences.zh: 其牢中星實則囚多，虛則開出。

translations.literal: When the central star of the prison is solid, there are many prisoners; when empty, they are released.

Ladle end has two stars: one inner spear, Zhao Yao; One outer shield, Heaven Peak. Has curved circle fifteen stars, belongs ladle, called lowly person's prison. Its prison middle star solid then prisoners many, empty then open out.

sentences.zh: 天一、槍、棓、矛、盾動搖，角大，兵起。

translations.literal: When Tianyi, Spear, Club, Spear, and Shield shake and move, and the horns grow large, armies rise.
Tian Yi, spear, club, spear, shield move shake, horns large, troops arise.
The Eastern Palace Azure Dragon consists of Fang and Xin.

sentences.zh: 心為明堂，大星天王，前後星子屬。

translations.literal: Xin forms the Bright Hall; its large star is the Heaven King, with the front and back stars as his attendants.
They should not be straight—if straight, the Heaven King loses his plans.
Fang serves as the storehouse, called Heaven's Driver.
Its yin side forms the right trace horse.
Beside has two stars called collar;
translations.idiomatic: Beside it are two stars called the Collar.

translations.literal: The northern star is called the Fan.
Twelve curved stars to the northeast form the Banner.
Banner middle four stars Heaven Market;
translations.idiomatic: Four stars in the banner's center form the Heavenly Market.

translations.literal: The middle six stars are called the Market Tower.
Market middle stars numerous solid;
translations.idiomatic: When the market's central stars are numerous, it is prosperous.

translations.literal: When empty, it is depleted.
The numerous stars south of Fang are called the Cavalry Official.

East Palace Azure Dragon, Fang, Xin. Xin is Bright Hall, big star Heaven King, front back stars son attendants. Not want straight, straight then Heaven King loses plan. Fang is Storehouse, called Heaven Driver. Its yin, right trace horse. Beside has two stars called collar; North one star called fan. Northeast curved twelve stars called banner. Banner middle four stars Heaven Market; Middle six stars called Market Tower. Market middle stars numerous solid; Its empty then waste. Fang south numerous stars called Cavalry Official.
Left horn, Li;
translations.idiomatic: The left horn is Li.

translations.literal: The right horn is the General.
The large horn forms the Heaven King's imperial court.

sentences.zh: 其兩旁各有三星，鼎足句之，曰攝提。

translations.literal: On each side are three stars, hooked like tripod feet, called Sheti.

sentences.zh: 攝提者，直斗杓所指，以建時節，故曰「攝提格」。

translations.literal: She Ti, straight Dipper ladle pointed, to establish time sections, thus called 'She Ti Ge'.
translations.idiomatic: Sheti points straight where the Dipper ladle indicates, establishing the seasonal divisions. Hence the name "Sheti Ge."

translations.literal: Kang forms the sparse temple and governs illness.
Its two large stars, north and south, are called the South Gate.
Di forms heaven's root and governs epidemics.

Left horn, Li; Right horn, General. Big horn, Heaven King imperial court. Its two sides each have three stars, tripod feet hooked, called She Ti. She Ti, straight Dipper ladle pointed, to establish time sections, thus called 'She Ti Ge'. Kang is sparse temple, governs illness. Its south north two big stars, called South Gate. Di is heaven root, governs epidemics.
Wei is nine sons, called ruler minister;
translations.idiomatic: Wei represents the nine sons, called ruler and minister.

translations.literal: When expelled and distant, they are not harmonious.
Ji represents the proud guest, called mouth and tongue.
Wei is nine sons, called ruler minister; Expelled distant, not harmonious. Ji is proud guest, called mouth tongue.
When fire offends and guards the horns, there will be battle.
Fang and Xin are hated by kings.
Fire offends guards Jue, then has battle. Fang Xin, kings hate it.
The Southern Palace Vermilion Bird consists of Quan and Heng.
Heng and Taiwei form the court of the three lights.
Barrier guard twelve stars, feudal ministers: west, general;
translations.idiomatic: The twelve guardian stars are feudal ministers: west, the general;

translations.literal: East, chancellor;
translations.idiomatic: east, the chancellor;

translations.literal: South four stars, execute law;
translations.idiomatic: south, four stars that execute the law;

translations.literal: Middle, main gate;
translations.idiomatic: center, the main gate;

translations.literal: on the gate's left and right, the wing gates.
Six stars inside the gate represent the feudal lords.
Five stars within these are the seats of the five emperors.

sentences.zh: 後聚一十五星，蔚然，曰郎位；

translations.literal: Back gather fifteen stars, luxuriant, called attendant positions;
translations.idiomatic: Fifteen stars gathered behind, luxuriant, called the attendant positions.

translations.literal: Beside them, one large star is the general's position.

sentences.zh: 月、五星順入，軌道，司其出，所守，天子所誅也。

translations.literal: When the moon and five planets enter in orderly fashion along their tracks, they oversee their exits and guard positions—what the Son of Heaven punishes.

sentences.zh: 其逆入，若不軌道，以所犯命之；

translations.literal: Its contrary enter, if not track path, with what offends determines;
translations.idiomatic: When they enter in contrary fashion, not following their tracks, their determinations are based on what they offend.

sentences.zh: 中坐，成形，皆群下從謀也。

translations.literal: When they sit in the center and form shapes, all ministers below follow in plotting.
Metal and fire are especially severe.

sentences.zh: 廷藩西有隋星五，曰少微，士大夫。

translations.literal: West of the court barrier are five Sui stars, called Shaowei, representing scholar officials.
Quan is Xuanyuan.
Xuanyuan forms the yellow dragon's body.
Front big star, female lord image;
translations.idiomatic: The front large star is the image of the female ruler.

translations.literal: The small stars beside it are the driver and rear palace attendants.
When the moon and five planets guard or offend, divine as with Heng.

South Palace Vermilion Bird, Quan, Heng. Heng, Tai Wei, three lights court. Barrier guard twelve stars, feudal ministers: west, general; East, chancellor; South four stars, execute law; Middle, main gate; Gate left right, wing gates. Gate inner six stars, feudal lords. Its inner five stars, five emperors seats. Back gather fifteen stars, luxuriant, called attendant positions; Beside one big star, general position. Moon five stars follow enter, track path, oversee their exit, their guard, son of heaven punishes. Its contrary enter, if not track path, with what offends determines; Middle seat, forms shape, all ministers below follow plot. Gold fire especially severe. Court barrier west has Sui stars five, called Shao Wei, scholar officials. Quan, Xuan Yuan. Xuan Yuan, yellow dragon body. Front big star, female lord image; Beside small stars, driver rear palace attendants. Moon five stars guard offend, like Heng divine.
Dongjing governs water affairs.
Its western curved stars are called Yue.
Yue north, north river;
translations.idiomatic: North of Yue is the North River.

translations.literal: South, south river;
translations.idiomatic: South is the South River.

translations.literal: Between the two rivers and the Heavenly Gate are the passes and bridges.
Yu Gui, ghost shrine affairs;
translations.idiomatic: Yu Gui governs ghost shrine affairs.

translations.literal: The central white one serves as hostage.

sentences.zh: 火守南北河，兵起，穀不登。

translations.literal: When fire guards the north and south rivers, armies rise and grain fails.

sentences.zh: 故德成衡，觀成潢，傷成鉞，禍成井，誅成質。

translations.literal: Thus virtue completes at Heng, observation completes at Kuang, wounds complete at Yue, calamities complete at Jing, executions complete at the hostage.

Dong Jing for water affairs. Its west curved stars called Yue. Yue north, north river; South, south river; Two rivers heaven gate between for passes bridges. Yu Gui, ghost shrine affairs; Middle white for hostage. Fire guards north south rivers, troops arise, grain not abundant. Thus virtue completes Heng, observe completes Kuang, wound completes Yue, calamity completes Jing, execute completes hostage.
Liu serves as the bird spout and governs wood and grass.
Seven Stars form the neck and serve as the round official.
It governs urgent affairs.
Zhang and Su serve as the kitchen and govern banquet guests.
Yi forms the feathers and governs distant guests.
Liu for bird spout, governs wood grass. Seven Stars, neck, for round official. Governs urgent affairs. Zhang, Su, for kitchen, governs banquet guests. Yi for feathers, governs distant guests.
Zhen forms the carriage and governs wind.

sentences.zh: 其旁有一小星，曰長沙，星星不欲明；

translations.literal: Its beside has one small star, called Chang Sha, stars not want bright;
translations.idiomatic: Beside it is one small star called Changsha—the stars should not be bright.

sentences.zh: 明與四星等，若五星入軫中，兵大起。

translations.literal: If bright and equal to four stars, or if five stars enter Zhen's midst, great armies will arise.
Zhen south numerous stars called heaven storehouse tower;
translations.idiomatic: The numerous stars south of Zhen are called the Heavenly Storehouse Tower.

translations.literal: The storehouse contains five chariots.

sentences.zh: 車星角若益眾，及不具，無處車馬。

translations.literal: If the chariot stars' horns increase in number, or are incomplete, there will be no place for chariots and horses.

Zhen for carriage, governs wind. Its beside has one small star, called Chang Sha, stars not want bright; Bright with four stars equal, if five stars enter Zhen midst, troops greatly arise. Zhen south numerous stars called heaven storehouse tower; Storehouse has five chariots. Chariot stars horns if increase numerous, and not complete, no place chariots horses.
The Western Palace Xianchi is called the Heavenly Five Kuang.
The Five Kuang are the chariot lodges of the five emperors.
Fire enters, drought;
translations.idiomatic: When fire enters, drought occurs.

translations.literal: Metal, troops;
translations.idiomatic: When metal enters, warfare.

translations.literal: Water brings floods.
Middle has three pillars;
translations.idiomatic: In the middle are three pillars.

translations.literal: When the pillars are incomplete, armies rise.

West Palace Xian Chi, called heaven five Kuang. Five Kuang, five emperors chariot lodges. Fire enters, drought; Metal, troops; Water, floods. Middle has three pillars; Pillars not complete, troops arise.
Kui is called Fengshi and governs ditches and drains.
Lou governs the gathering of crowds.
Wei serves as the Heavenly Granary.
The numerous stars to its south are called the storehouse accumulations.
Kui called Feng Shi, for ditches drains. Lou for gathering crowds. Wei for Heaven Granary. Its south numerous stars called storehouse accumulations.

sentences.zh: 昴曰髦頭，胡星也，為白衣會。

translations.literal: Mao is called the mane head, a barbarian star, governing assemblies in white clothing.

sentences.zh: 畢曰罕車，為邊兵，主弋獵。

translations.literal: Bi is called the sparse vehicle and governs border troops and hunting.
The small star beside its large star forms the attached ear.

sentences.zh: 附耳搖動，有讒亂臣在側。

translations.literal: When the attached ear shakes and moves, slanderous chaotic ministers are at the side.
Between Mao and Bi lies the Heavenly Street.
Its yin, yin states;
translations.idiomatic: Its yin side represents the yin states.

translations.literal: Its yang side represents the yang states.

Mao called mane head, Hu star, for white clothes assembly. Bi called sparse vehicle, for border troops, governs shooting hunting. Its big star beside small star for attached ear. Attached ear shakes moves, has slanderous chaos minister at side. Mao Bi between for Heaven Street. Its yin, yin states; Yang, yang states.
Shen forms the White Tiger.
Three stars in a straight line form the balance stone.

sentences.zh: 下有三星，兌，曰罰，為斬艾事。

translations.literal: Below are three stars of the Dui trigram, called Punishment, governing the cutting of weeds.
The outer four stars are the left and right shoulders and thighs.

sentences.zh: 小三星隅置，曰觜觿，為虎首，主葆旅事。

translations.literal: Three small stars placed at the corners are called Zixi, forming the tiger's head and governing guard and travel affairs.
Four stars to its south are called the Heavenly Toilet.
One star below the toilet is called the Heavenly Arrow.
Arrow yellow then auspicious;
translations.idiomatic: When the arrow is yellow, it is auspicious.

translations.literal: When blue, white, or black, it is inauspicious.

sentences.zh: 其西有句曲九星，三處羅：一曰天旗，二曰天苑，三曰九游。

translations.literal: Its west has curved nine stars, three places spread: one called Heaven Flag, two called Heaven Garden, three called Nine Roam.
translations.idiomatic: To its west are nine curved stars spread in three places: first called Heaven Flag, second called Heaven Garden, third called Nine Roam.

translations.literal: To its east is a large star called Wolf.
When the Wolf's horns change color, there are many bandits and thieves.
Below are four stars called Arc, facing the Wolf.

sentences.zh: 狼比地有大星，曰南極老人。

translations.literal: Compared to earth, there is a large star beside Wolf called the South Pole Old Man.
Old Man appears, governance peaceful;
translations.idiomatic: When the Old Man appears, governance is peaceful.

translations.literal: When he does not appear, armies rise.

sentences.zh: 常以秋分時候之于南郊。

translations.literal: He is constantly observed at the south suburb during the autumn equinox.

Shen for White Tiger. Three stars straight, this is balance stone. Below has three stars, Dui, called punishment, for cutting weed affairs. Its outer four stars, left right shoulders thighs. Small three stars corner placed, called Zi Xi, for tiger head, governs guard travel affairs. Its south has four stars, called Heaven Toilet. Toilet below one star, called Heaven Arrow. Arrow yellow then auspicious; Blue white black, inauspicious. Its west has curved nine stars, three places spread: one called Heaven Flag, two called Heaven Garden, three called Nine Roam. Its east has big star called Wolf. Wolf horns change color, many bandits thieves. Below has four stars called Arc, straight Wolf. Wolf compared to earth has big star, called South Pole Old Man. Old Man appears, governance peaceful; Not appears, troops arise. Constantly at autumn equinox time observe at south suburb.
When the attached ear enters Bi's midst, armies rise.
Attached ear enters Bi midst, troops arise.
The Northern Palace Black Tortoise consists of Xu and Wei.
Wei for covering house;
translations.idiomatic: Wei forms the covering house.

translations.literal: Xu governs weeping and crying affairs.
North Palace Black Tortoise, Xu, Wei. Wei for covering house; Xu for weeping crying affairs.

sentences.zh: 其南有眾星，曰羽林天軍。

translations.literal: Numerous stars to its south are called the Feather Forest Heavenly Army.
West of the army is the rampart, or called Yue.
Beside it is one large star called North Fall.

sentences.zh: 北落若微亡，軍星動角益希，及五星犯北落，入軍，軍起。

translations.literal: When North Fall is faint or lost, the army stars move and their horns become sparser. When the five planets offend North Fall and enter the army, armies rise.
Fire metal water especially severe: fire, army worry;
translations.idiomatic: Fire, metal, and water are especially severe: fire brings army worries.

translations.literal: Water, flood calamity;
translations.idiomatic: Water brings flood calamities.

translations.literal: Wood and earth bring army auspiciousness.

sentences.zh: 危東六星，兩兩相比，曰司空。

translations.literal: Six stars east of Wei, paired in opposition, are called Sikong.

Its south has numerous stars, called Feather Forest Heaven Army. Army west for rampart, or called Yue. Beside has one big star for North Fall. North Fall if faint lost, army stars move horns more sparse, and five planets offend North Fall, enter army, army arises. Fire metal water especially severe: fire, army worry; Water, flood calamity; Wood earth, army auspicious. Wei east six stars, two two compared, called Si Kong.

sentences.zh: 營室為清廟，曰離宮、閣道。

translations.literal: Camp Room forms the pure temple, called Li Palace and Pavilion Way.
Four stars in the middle of the Milky Way are called Heaven Driver.
One star beside it is called Wang Liang.
Wang Liang whips his horses, filling the fields with chariots and cavalry.
Beside them are eight stars crossing the Milky Way, called Heaven Kuang.
Beside Heaven Kuang is the Jiang star.
When the Jiang star moves, people ford the waters.

Camp Room for pure temple, called Li Palace, Pavilion Way. Milky Way middle four stars, called Heaven Driver. Beside one star, called Wang Liang. Wang Liang whips horses, chariots cavalry fill fields. Beside has eight stars, cross Milky Way, called Heaven Kuang. Heaven Kuang beside, Jiang star. Jiang star moves, people ford water.
The four stars Chui and Chou are south of Wei.

sentences.zh: 匏瓜，有青黑星守之，魚鹽貴。

translations.literal: Paogua has blue-black stars guarding it—fish and salt become expensive.
Chui Chou four stars, in Wei south. Pao Gua, has blue black star guards it, fish salt expensive.
The Southern Dipper forms the temple; north of it is the Jian star.
The Jian star represents the banner.
Qianniu provides the sacrificial animal.
North of it is Hegu.
He Gu big star, upper general;
translations.idiomatic: Hegu's large star is the senior general.

translations.literal: Left and right are the left and right generals.
Wunu; north of it is Zhinu.
Zhinu is the grandson of the heavenly maiden.

South Dipper for temple, its north Jian star. Jian star, banner. Qian Niu for sacrificial animal. Its north He Gu. He Gu big star, upper general; Left right, left right generals. Wu Nu, its north Zhi Nu. Zhi Nu, heaven girl grandson.

sentences.zh: 察日、月之行以揆歲星順逆。

translations.literal: Observe the movements of sun and moon to measure the year star's forward and backward motion.
It is called Eastern Wood, governs spring, and is called Jia and Yi.
When righteousness is lost, punishment emerges from the year star.
The year star's advances and retreats determine the fate of states based on its lodgings.

sentences.zh: 所在國不可伐，可以罰人。

translations.literal: The state where it resides cannot be attacked, but can be punished through persons.

sentences.zh: 其趨舍而前曰贏，退舍曰縮。

translations.literal: When it hurries to its lodgings and advances, it is called advancing; when it retreats to its lodgings, it is called retreating.
Advance, its state has troops not return;
translations.idiomatic: When advancing, its state has troops that do not return.

sentences.zh: 縮，其國有憂，將亡，國傾敗。

translations.literal: When retreating, its state has worries, will perish, and the state will overturn and be defeated.

sentences.zh: 其所在，五星皆從而聚於一舍，其下之國可以義致天下。

translations.literal: Where it resides, all five planets follow and gather in one lodging—the state below it can bring all under heaven through righteousness.

Observe sun moon conduct to measure year star forward backward. Called eastern wood, governs spring, called Jia Yi. Righteousness lost, punishment exits year star. Year star advance retreat, with its lodges determines state. Where state cannot attack, can punish person. Its hurry lodges and advance called advance, retreat lodges called retreat. Advance, its state has troops not return; Retreat, its state has worry, will perish, state overturn defeat. Its where, five stars all follow gather at one lodge, its below state can with righteousness bring all under heaven.

sentences.zh: 以攝提格歲：歲陰左行在寅，歲星右轉居丑。

translations.literal: With She Ti Ge year: year yin left goes in Yin, year star right turns dwells Chou.
translations.idiomatic: Using the Sheti Ge year: the year's yin moves left into Yin, the year star turns right and dwells in Chou.

sentences.zh: 正月，與斗、牽牛晨出東方，名曰監德。

translations.literal: In the first month, it emerges in the morning with Dou and Qianniu in the east, called Jiande.
Its color is deep blue with light.
When it loses its order, there will be a response appearing in Liu.
Year early, floods;
translations.idiomatic: When the year is early, floods occur.

translations.literal: When late, drought.

With She Ti Ge year: year yin left goes in Yin, year star right turns dwells Chou. First month, with Dou, Qian Niu morning out eastern, named Jian De. Color blue blue has light. Its loses order, has response appears Liu. Year early, floods; Late, drought.

sentences.zh: 歲星出，東行十二度，百日而止，反逆行；

translations.literal: Year star out, east goes twelve degrees, hundred days then stops, contrary goes;
translations.idiomatic: The year star emerges and goes east twelve degrees, stops after a hundred days, then moves in reverse.

translations.literal: It moves in reverse eight degrees, after a hundred days, then goes east again.

sentences.zh: 歲行三十度十六分度之七，率日行十二分度之一，十二歲而周天。

translations.literal: The year travels thirty degrees and sixteen sevenths of a degree, at a rate of one twelfth of a degree per day, completing the heavenly circuit in twelve years.
Out constantly eastern, with morning;
translations.idiomatic: It constantly emerges in the east with the morning.

translations.literal: It enters in the west using dusk.

Year star out, east goes twelve degrees, hundred days then stops, contrary goes; Contrary goes eight degrees, hundred days, again east goes. Year goes thirty degrees sixteen fen degree seven, rate day goes twelve fen degree one, twelve years circles heaven. Out constantly eastern, with morning; Enters western, uses dusk.

sentences.zh: 單閼歲：歲陰在卯，星居子。

translations.literal: Dan Yan year: year yin in Mao, star dwells Zi.
translations.idiomatic: Danyan year: the year's yin is in Mao, the star dwells in Zi.

sentences.zh: 以二月與婺女、虛、危晨出，曰降入。

translations.literal: In the second month, it emerges in the morning with Wunu, Xu, and Wei, called Jiangru.
It has great light.
When it loses its order, there will be a response appearing in Zhang.
That year has great floods.
Dan Yan year: year yin in Mao, star dwells Zi. With second month and Wu Nu, Xu, Wei morning out, called Jiang Ru. Great has light. Its loses order, has response appears Zhang. Its year great floods.

sentences.zh: 執徐歲：歲陰在辰，星居亥。

translations.literal: Zhi Xu year: year yin in Chen, star dwells Hai.
translations.idiomatic: Zhixu year: the year's yin is in Chen, the star dwells in Hai.

sentences.zh: 以三月［居］與營室、東壁晨出，曰青章。

translations.literal: In the third month, it emerges in the morning with Yingshi and Dongbi, called Qingzhang.
Deep blue and very bright.
Its loses order;
translations.idiomatic: When it loses its order,

translations.literal: there will be a response appearing in Zhen.
Year early, drought;
translations.idiomatic: When the year is early, drought occurs.

translations.literal: When late, floods.

Zhi Xu year: year yin in Chen, star dwells Hai. With third month and Ying Shi, Dong Bi morning out, called Qing Zhang. Blue blue very bright. Its loses order; Has response appears Zhen. Year early, drought; Late, floods.

sentences.zh: 大荒駱歲：歲陰在巳，星居戌。

translations.literal: Da Huang Luo year: year yin in Si, star dwells Xu.
translations.idiomatic: Dahuangluo year: the year's yin is in Si, the star dwells in Xu.

sentences.zh: 以四月與奎、婁［胃昴］晨出，曰跰踵。

translations.literal: In the fourth month, it emerges in the morning with Kui and Lou, called Bozhong.
Bear-like red color with light.
When it loses its order, there will be a response appearing in Kang.
Da Huang Luo year: year yin in Si, star dwells Xu. With fourth month and Kui, Lou morning out, called Bo Zhong. Bear bear red color, has light. Its loses order, has response appears Kang.

sentences.zh: 敦牂歲：歲陰在午，星居酉。

translations.literal: Dun Zang year: year yin in Wu, star dwells You.
translations.idiomatic: Dunzang year: the year's yin is in Wu, the star dwells in You.

sentences.zh: 以五月與胃、昴、畢晨出，曰開明。

translations.literal: In the fifth month, it emerges in the morning with Wei, Mao, and Bi, called Kaiming.
Bright and radiant with light.
Cease troops;
translations.idiomatic: Troops are laid down.

translations.literal: It only benefits dukes and kings, is not beneficial for managing troops.
When it loses its order, there will be a response appearing in Fang.
Year early, drought;
translations.idiomatic: When the year is early, drought occurs.

translations.literal: When late, floods.

Dun Zang year: year yin in Wu, star dwells You. With fifth month and Wei, Mao, Bi morning out, called Kai Ming. Bright bright has light. Cease troops; Only beneficial to duke king, not beneficial to managing troops. Its loses order, has response appears Fang. Year early, drought; Late, floods.

sentences.zh: 協洽歲：歲陰在未，星居申。

translations.literal: Xie Xia year: year yin in Wei, star dwells Shen.
translations.idiomatic: Xieqia year: the year's yin is in Wei, the star dwells in Shen.

sentences.zh: 以六月與觜觿、參晨出，曰長列。

translations.literal: In the sixth month, it emerges in the morning with Zixi and Shen, called Changlie.
Bright and radiant with light.
Beneficial for marching troops.
When it loses its order, there will be a response appearing in Ji.

Xie Xia year: year yin in Wei, star dwells Shen. With sixth month and Zi Xi, Shen morning out, called Long Column. Bright bright has light. Beneficial to march troops. Its loses order, has response appears Ji.

sentences.zh: 涒灘歲：歲陰在申，星居未。

translations.literal: Hun Tan year: year yin in Shen, star dwells Wei.
translations.idiomatic: Huntan year: the year's yin is in Shen, the star dwells in Wei.

sentences.zh: 以七月與東井、輿鬼晨出，曰大音。

translations.literal: In the seventh month, it emerges in the morning with Dongjing and Yugui, called Dayin.
Bright and radiantly white.
When it loses its order, there will be a response appearing in Qianniu.
Hun Tan year: year yin in Shen, star dwells Wei. With seventh month and Dong Jing, Yu Gui morning out, called Great Sound. Bright bright white. Its loses order, has response appears Qian Niu.

sentences.zh: 作鄂歲：歲陰在酉，星居午。

translations.literal: Zuo E year: year yin in You, star dwells Wu.
translations.idiomatic: Zuo'e year: the year's yin is in You, the star dwells in Wu.

sentences.zh: 以八月與柳、七星、張晨出，曰（為）長王。

translations.literal: In the eighth month, it emerges in the morning with Liu, Seven Stars, and Zhang, called Changwang.
Rising and falling with spikes.
The state will prosper, grain will ripen.
When it loses its order, there will be a response appearing in Wei.

sentences.zh: ［曰大章］有旱而昌，有女喪，民疾。

translations.literal: There will be drought yet prosperity, female mourning, and people's illnesses.

Zuo E year: year yin in You, star dwells Wu. With eighth month and Liu, Seven Stars, Zhang morning out, called Long Wang. Zuo zuo has spikes. State its prosperous, ripe grain. Its loses order, has response appears Wei. Has drought and prosperous, has female mourning, people illness.

sentences.zh: 閹茂歲：歲陰在戌，星居巳。

translations.literal: Yan Mao year: year yin in Xu, star dwells Si.
translations.idiomatic: Yanmao year: the year's yin is in Xu, the star dwells in Si.

sentences.zh: 以九月與翼、軫晨出，曰天睢。

translations.literal: In the ninth month, it emerges in the morning with Yi and Zhen, called Tiansui.
White color, greatly bright.
When it loses its order, there will be a response appearing in Dongbi.
The year has floods and female mourning.

Yan Mao year: year yin in Xu, star dwells Si. With ninth month and Yi, Zhen morning out, called Heaven Sui. White color greatly bright. Its loses order, has response appears Dong Bi. Year floods, female mourning.

sentences.zh: 大淵獻歲：歲陰在亥，星居辰。

translations.literal: Da Yuan Xian year: year yin in Hai, star dwells Chen.
translations.idiomatic: Dayuanxian year: the year's yin is in Hai, the star dwells in Chen.

sentences.zh: 以十月與角、亢晨出，曰大章。

translations.literal: In the tenth month, it emerges in the morning with Jue and Kang, called Dazhang.

sentences.zh: 蒼蒼然，星若躍而陰出旦，是謂「正平」。

translations.literal: Cang cang thus, stars if leap and yin out dawn, this called 'correct level'.
translations.idiomatic: Deep blue thus, stars as if leaping while yin emerges at dawn—this is called "correct level."

translations.literal: Raise army troops, its commander must martial;
translations.idiomatic: When raising armies and troops, their commanders must be martial.

translations.literal: If its state has virtue, it will possess the four seas.
When it loses its order, there will be a response appearing in Lou.

Da Yuan Xian year: year yin in Hai, star dwells Chen. With tenth month and Jue, Kang morning out, called Great Zhang. Cang cang thus, stars if leap and yin out dawn, this called 'correct level'. Raise army troops, its commander must martial; Its state has virtue, will have four seas. Its loses order, has response appears Lou.

sentences.zh: 困敦歲：歲陰在子，星居卯。

translations.literal: Kun Dun year: year yin in Zi, star dwells Mao.
translations.idiomatic: Kundun year: the year's yin is in Zi, the star dwells in Mao.

sentences.zh: 以十一月與氐、房、心晨出，曰天泉。

translations.literal: In the eleventh month, it emerges in the morning with Di, Fang, and Xin, called Tianquan.
Black color, very bright.
Rivers and pools will prosper, not beneficial for raising troops.
When it loses its order, there will be a response appearing in Mao.

Kun Dun year: year yin in Zi, star dwells Mao. With eleventh month and Di, Fang, Xin morning out, called Heaven Spring. Black color very bright. Rivers pools its prosperous, not beneficial to raise troops. Its loses order, has response appears Mao.

sentences.zh: 赤奮若歲：歲陰在丑，星居寅，以十二月與尾、箕晨出，曰天皓。

translations.literal: Chi Fen Ruo year: year yin in Chou, star dwells Yin, with twelfth month and Wei, Ji morning out, called Heaven Hao.
translations.idiomatic: Chifengruo year: the year's yin is in Chou, the star dwells in Yin. In the twelfth month, it emerges in the morning with Wei and Ji, called Tianhao.

translations.literal: Dark thus, black color very bright.
When it loses its order, there will be a response appearing in Shen.
Chi Fen Ruo year: year yin in Chou, star dwells Yin, with twelfth month and Wei, Ji morning out, called Heaven Hao. Zhe thus black color very bright. Its loses order, has response appears Shen.

sentences.zh: 當居不居，居之又左右搖，未當去去之，與他星會，其國凶。

translations.literal: When it should dwell but does not, or dwells then moreover shakes left and right, or goes when it should not go, or meets with other stars, its state is inauspicious.
If it dwells long, the state has thick virtue.

sentences.zh: 其角動，乍小乍大，若色數變，人主有憂。

translations.literal: When its horns move, suddenly small then big, if the color changes several times, the ruler has worries.

Should dwell not dwell, dwell then moreover left right shake, not should go go it, with other stars meet, its state inauspicious. Its dwells long, state has virtue thick. Its horns move, suddenly small suddenly big, if color several change, person lord has worry.

sentences.zh: 其失次舍以下，進而東北，三月生天棓，長四丈，末兌，進而東南，三月生彗星，長二丈，類彗。

translations.literal: When it loses its ordered lodgings below, advances northeast, in three months gives birth to the Heaven Club, four zhang long, ending in Dui; advances southeast, in three months gives birth to the comet, two zhang long, resembling a comet.

sentences.zh: 退而西北，三月生天欃，長四丈，末兌。

translations.literal: Retreats northwest, in three months gives birth to the Heaven Chan, four zhang long, ending in Dui.

sentences.zh: 退而西南，三月生天槍，長數丈，兩頭兌。

translations.literal: Retreats southwest, in three months gives birth to the Heaven Spear, several zhang long, both heads in Dui.

sentences.zh: 謹視其所見之國，不可舉事用兵。

translations.literal: Carefully observe the state where it appears—one cannot raise affairs or use troops.

sentences.zh: 其出如浮如沈，其國有土功；

translations.literal: Its out like float like sink, its state has earth works;
translations.idiomatic: If it emerges floating or sinking, its state has earthworks.

translations.literal: If sinking then floating, its fields are lost.

sentences.zh: 色赤而有角，其所居國昌。

translations.literal: If red in color and has horns, the state where it dwells will prosper.
Those who meet its horns and battle will not be victorious.

sentences.zh: 星色赤黃而沈，所居野大穰。

translations.literal: If the star's color is red-yellow and sinks, the fields where it dwells will be greatly abundant.

sentences.zh: 色青白而赤灰，所居野有憂。

translations.literal: If blue-white color mixed with red-gray, the fields where it dwells have worries.
Year star enters moon, its fields have expel chancellor;
translations.idiomatic: When the year star enters the moon, its fields have expelled chancellors.

translations.literal: When it fights with Taibai, its fields have broken armies.

Its loses order lodges below, advances east north, three months born heaven club, long four zhang, end Dui, advances east south, three months born comet, long two zhang, resembles comet. Retreats west north, three months born heaven chan, long four zhang, end Dui. Retreats west south, three months born heaven spear, long several zhang, two heads Dui. Carefully observe its seen state, cannot raise affairs use troops. Its out like float like sink, its state has earth works; Like sink like float, its fields lost. Color red and has horns, its dwells state prosperous. Meet horns and battle, not victorious. Star color red yellow and sinks, its dwells fields greatly abundant. Color blue white and red gray, its dwells fields have worry. Year star enters moon, its fields have expel chancellor; With Tai Bai fight, its fields have broken army.

sentences.zh: 歲星一曰攝提，曰重華，曰應星，曰紀星。

translations.literal: The year star is also called Sheti, Chonghua, Yingxing, Jixing.
Camp Room forms the pure temple, the year star's temple.
Year star one called She Ti, called Chong Hua, called Ying Star, called Ji Star. Camp Room is pure temple, year star temple.
Observe the firm qi to position Yinghuo.
It is called Southern Fire, governs summer, called Bing and Ding.

sentences.zh: 禮失，罰出熒惑，熒惑失行是也。

translations.literal: When ritual is lost, punishment emerges from Yinghuo—Yinghuo losing its proper course.
When it emerges, there are troops; when it enters, troops scatter.
Its lodgings determine the fate of states.

sentences.zh: （熒惑）熒惑為勃亂，殘賊、疾、喪、饑、兵。

translations.literal: Yinghuo represents violent chaos, remnant harm, illness, mourning, famine, warfare.

sentences.zh: 反道二舍以上，居之，三月有殃，五月受兵，七月半亡地，九月太半亡地。

translations.literal: When contrary to the way by two lodgings or more and dwells there, in three months there is calamity, in five months receives troops, in seven months loses half its land, in nine months loses most of its land.
Because it enters and exits together with it, the state's sacrifices are extinguished.
Dwells it, calamity returns arrive, though great when small;
translations.idiomatic: When it dwells there, calamity returns—even if great it becomes small.

translations.literal: If it stays long and arrives, when small it becomes great instead.

sentences.zh: 其南為丈夫［喪］，北為女子喪。

translations.literal: Its south brings husband mourning, north brings wife mourning.

sentences.zh: 若角動繞環之，及乍前乍後，左右，殃益大。

translations.literal: If horns move and circle around it, or suddenly front then back, left and right, the calamity grows greater.
With other stars fight, light mutually reach, becomes harm;
translations.idiomatic: When it fights with other stars and their lights reach each other, it becomes harmful.

translations.literal: When they do not reach each other, there is no harm.

sentences.zh: 五星皆從而聚于一舍，其下國可以禮致天下。

translations.literal: When all five planets follow and gather in one lodging, the state below can bring all under heaven through ritual.

Observe firm qi to place Ying Huo. Called southern fire, governs summer, called Bing, Ding. Ritual lost, punishment exits Ying Huo, Ying Huo loses conduct this is. Exits then has troops, enters then troops scatter. With its lodges determine state. Ying Huo for violent chaos, remnant harm, illness, mourning, famine, troops. Contrary way two lodges above, dwells it, three months has calamity, five months receives troops, seven months half loses land, nine months great half loses land. Because with together enter exit, state extinguishes sacrifices. Dwells it, calamity returns arrive, though great when small; Long and arrive, when small contrary great. Its south for husband mourning, north for wife mourning. If horns move circle ring it, and suddenly front suddenly back, left right, calamity increases great. With other stars fight, light mutually reach, becomes harm; Not mutually reach, not harm. Five stars all follow and gather at one lodge, its below state can with ritual bring all under heaven.
Method, exits east goes sixteen lodges then stops;
translations.idiomatic: Its method: emerges and goes east sixteen lodgings then stops.

translations.literal: Inverse goes two lodges;
translations.idiomatic: Moves in reverse two lodgings.

sentences.zh: 六旬，復東行，自所止數十舍，十月而入西方；

translations.literal: Sixty days, again east goes, from its stops counts ten lodges, ten months enters western;
translations.idiomatic: After sixty days, goes east again; from where it stops, counting ten lodgings, in ten months enters the west.

translations.literal: Travels hidden for five months, emerges in the east.

sentences.zh: 其出西方曰「反明」，主命者惡之。

translations.literal: Its exits western called 'contrary bright', governs fate bad it.
translations.idiomatic: When it emerges in the west it is called "contrary bright"—those who govern fate hate it.

translations.literal: Its eastern movement is urgent, traveling one and a half degrees per day.

Method, exits east goes sixteen lodges then stops; Inverse goes two lodges; Sixty days, again east goes, from its stops counts ten lodges, ten months enters western; Hidden goes five months, exits eastern. Its exits western called 'contrary bright', governs fate bad it. East goes urgent, one day goes one degree half.
Its movements east, west, south, north are all urgent.
Troops each gather its below;
translations.idiomatic: Troops each gather below it.

translations.literal: When using battle, following it brings victory, going against it brings defeat.
Ying Huo follows Tai Bai, army worry;
translations.idiomatic: When Yinghuo follows Taibai, armies have worries.

translations.literal: When it separates, armies retreat.
Exits Tai Bai yin, has divide army;
translations.idiomatic: When it emerges from Taibai's yin, there are divided armies.

translations.literal: When it goes through its yang, there are partial generals battling.

sentences.zh: 當其行，太白逮之，破軍殺將。

translations.literal: When it moves and Taibai reaches it, armies are broken and generals killed.

sentences.zh: 其入守犯太微、軒轅、營室，主命惡之。

translations.literal: When it enters and guards or offends Taiwei, Xuanyuan, Ying Shi, those who govern fate hate it.
Xin forms the Bright Hall, Yinghuo's temple.
Carefully observe this.

Its goes east west south north urgent. Troops each gather its below; Use battle, follows it victorious, contrary it defeated. Ying Huo follows Tai Bai, army worry; Separates it, army retreats. Exits Tai Bai yin, has divide army; Goes its yang, has partial general battle. When its goes, Tai Bai reaches it, breaks army kills general. Its enters guards offends Tai Wei, Xuan Yuan, Camp Room, governs fate bad it. Xin is Bright Hall, Ying Huo temple. Carefully wait this.

sentences.zh: 歷斗之會以定填星之位。

translations.literal: Use the Dipper's meetings to determine Tianxing's position.

sentences.zh: 曰中央土，主季夏，日戊、己，黃帝，主德，女主象也。

translations.literal: It is called Central Earth, governs late summer, called Wu and Ji, the Yellow Emperor, governs virtue, and is the image of the female lord.
When Tianxing stays in one lodging for a year, the state where it dwells is auspicious.

sentences.zh: 未當居而居，若已去而復還，還居之，其國得土，不乃得女。

translations.literal: When it dwells where it should not, or has already gone and returns again to dwell there, its state obtains earth, or else obtains a female.

sentences.zh: 若當居而不居，既已居之，又西東去，其國失土，不乃失女，不可舉事用兵。

translations.literal: If it should dwell but does not, or after dwelling there goes west or east, its state loses earth, or else loses a female—one cannot raise affairs or use troops.
Its dwells long, its state blessing thick;
translations.idiomatic: When it dwells long, its state has thick blessings.

translations.literal: When it moves easily, blessings are thin.

Li Dipper meeting to settle Tian Xing position. Called central earth, governs late summer, called Wu, Ji, Yellow Emperor, governs virtue, female lord image. Year Tian one lodge, its dwells state auspicious. Not should dwell dwells, if already goes and again returns, returns dwells it, its state gets earth, not then gets female. If should dwell not dwell, already dwells it, moreover west east goes, its state loses earth, not then loses female, cannot raise affairs use troops. Its dwells long, its state blessing thick; Easy, blessing thin.
Its other name is Earth Marquis, governs the year.

sentences.zh: 歲行十（二）［三］度百十二分度之五，日行二十八分度之一，二十八歲周天。

translations.literal: The year travels thirteen degrees and one hundred twelve fifths of a degree, daily travels one twenty-eighth of a degree, completing the heavenly circuit in twenty-eight years.

sentences.zh: 其所居，五星皆從而聚于一舍，其下之國，可［以］重致天下。

translations.literal: Where it dwells, all five planets follow and gather in one lodging—the state below can heavily bring all under heaven.

sentences.zh: 禮、德、義、殺、刑盡失，而填星乃為之動搖。

translations.literal: When ritual, virtue, righteousness, killing, and punishment are all lost, then Tianxing moves and shakes for it.

Its one name called Earth Hou, governs year. Year goes thirteen degrees hundred twelve fen degree five, day goes twenty eight fen degree one, twenty eight years circles heaven. Its dwells, five stars all follow gather at one lodge, its below state, can heavy bring all under heaven. Ritual virtue righteousness kill punishment all lost, then Tian Xing for it moves shakes.
Advance, for king not peaceful;
translations.idiomatic: When advancing, the king is not peaceful.

translations.literal: When retreating, there are armies that do not return.

sentences.zh: 填星，其色黃，九芒，音曰黃鐘宮。

translations.literal: Tianxing's color is yellow, with nine spikes; its sound is called Huangzhong Gong.

sentences.zh: 其失次上二三宿曰贏，有主命不成，不乃大水。

translations.literal: When it loses its order by two or three lodgings above, it is called advancing—there is incomplete lordly fate, or else great floods.

sentences.zh: 失次下二三宿曰縮，有后戚，其歲不復，不乃天裂若地動。

translations.literal: When it loses its order by two or three lodgings below, it is called retreating—there is queenly sorrow, the year does not return, or else heaven cracks or earth moves.

Advance, for king not peaceful; Its retreat, has army not return. Tian Xing, its color yellow, nine spikes, sound called Huang Zhong Gong. Its loses order up two three lodges called advance, has lord fate not complete, not then great floods. Loses order down two three lodges called retreat, has queen sorrow, its year not return, not then heaven crack if earth move.

sentences.zh: 斗為文太室，填星廟，天子之星也。

translations.literal: The Dipper forms the civil great chamber, Tianxing's temple, the star of the Son of Heaven.
Dipper for civil great chamber, Tian Xing temple, son of heaven star.
When the wood star combines with earth, it brings inner chaos.
Famine, lord not use battle, defeated;
translations.idiomatic: Famine—the lord should not use battle, will be defeated.

translations.literal: Water then change plans and change affairs;
translations.idiomatic: Water then changes plans and changes affairs.

translations.literal: Fire for drought;
translations.idiomatic: Fire brings drought.

translations.literal: Metal brings white-clothed assemblies or floods.

sentences.zh: 金在南曰牝牡，年穀熟，金在北，歲偏無。

translations.literal: When metal is in the south it is called female-male, the year's grain ripens; when metal is in the north, the year is partially without.

sentences.zh: 火與水合為焠，與金合為鑠，為喪，皆不可舉事，用兵大敗。

translations.literal: When fire combines with water it forms quenching, with metal forms melting, brings mourning—all cannot raise affairs, using troops brings great defeat.
Earth for worry, governs calamity ministers;
translations.idiomatic: Earth brings worry, governs calamity ministers.

sentences.zh: 大饑，戰敗，為北軍，軍困，舉事大敗。

translations.literal: Great famine, battle defeated, becomes northern army, army distressed, raising affairs brings great defeat.

sentences.zh: 土與水合，穰而擁閼，有覆軍，其國不可舉事。

translations.literal: When earth combines with water, abundant yet blocked and stopped, there are overturned armies, its state cannot raise affairs.
Out, loses land;
translations.idiomatic: When emerging, loses land.

translations.literal: When entering, gains land.
Metal brings illness, inner troops, loss of land.

sentences.zh: 三星若合，其宿地國外內有兵與喪，改立公王。

translations.literal: When three stars combine, in the land of its lodging state, outer and inner have troops and mourning, change and establish duke and king.

sentences.zh: 四星合，兵喪并起，君子憂，小人流。

translations.literal: When four stars combine, troops and mourning arise together, gentlemen worry, small people flee.

sentences.zh: 五星合，是為易行，有德，受慶，改立大人，掩有四方，子孫蕃昌；

translations.literal: Five stars combine, this is easy conduct, has virtue, receives celebration, change establish great man, covers has four directions, sons grandsons numerous prosperous;
translations.idiomatic: When five stars combine, this is easy conduct, has virtue, receives celebration, change and establish great man, covers and possesses the four directions, sons and grandsons numerous and prosperous.

translations.literal: Without virtue, receives calamity or perishes.
Five stars all great, its affairs also great;
translations.idiomatic: When all five stars are great, affairs are also great.

translations.literal: When all small, affairs are also small.

Wood star with earth combines, for inner chaos. Famine, lord not use battle, defeated; Water then change plans and change affairs; Fire for drought; Metal for white clothes assembly if floods. Metal in south called female male, year grain ripe, metal in north, year partial none. Fire with water combines for quench, with metal combines for melt, for mourning, all cannot raise affairs, use troops greatly defeated. Earth for worry, governs calamity ministers; Great famine, battle defeated, for northern army, army distressed, raise affairs greatly defeated. Earth with water combines, abundant and blocked stopped, has overturned army, its state cannot raise affairs. Out, loses land; Enter, gets land. Metal for illness, for inner troops, loses land. Three stars if combine, its lodge land state outer inner has troops and mourning, change establish duke king. Four stars combine, troops mourning together arise, gentlemen worry, small people flow. Five stars combine, this is easy conduct, has virtue, receives celebration, change establish great man, covers has four directions, sons grandsons numerous prosperous; No virtue, receives calamity if perishes. Five stars all great, its affairs also great; All small, affairs also small.
Early emergence is advancing, advancing is the guest.

sentences.zh: 晚出者為縮，縮者為主人。

translations.literal: Late emergence is retreating, retreating is the host.
There must be a heavenly response appearing at the ladle star.
Same lodging is combining.

sentences.zh: 相陵為斗，七寸以內必之矣。

translations.literal: Mutual oppression is fighting, within seven cun it must happen.

Early out for advance, advance for guest. Late out for retreat, retreat for host. Must have heaven response appears at ladle star. Same lodge for combine. Mutually oppress for fight, seven cun within must it.
Five stars color white circle, for mourning drought;
translations.idiomatic: When five stars are white and circular, bring mourning and drought.

translations.literal: Red circle, then middle not peaceful, for troops;
translations.idiomatic: When red and circular, the center is not peaceful, brings troops.

translations.literal: Blue circle, for worry floods;
translations.idiomatic: When blue and circular, brings worry and floods.

translations.literal: Black circle, for illness, many die;
translations.idiomatic: When black and circular, brings illness and many deaths.

translations.literal: When yellow and circular, then auspicious.

sentences.zh: 赤角犯我城，黃角地之爭，白角哭泣之聲，青角有兵憂，黑角則水。

translations.literal: Red horns offend my city, yellow horns bring land disputes, white horns bring sounds of weeping and crying, blue horns bring troop worries, black horns bring floods.
Intent: conducts to the end place of exhausted troops.

sentences.zh: 五星同色，天下偃兵，百姓寧昌。

translations.literal: When five stars are same color, all under heaven ceases troops, the hundred surnames are peaceful and prosperous.

sentences.zh: 春風秋雨，冬寒夏暑，動搖常以此。

translations.literal: Spring winds, autumn rains, winter cold, summer heat—movements and shakes constantly follow this.

Five stars color white circle, for mourning drought; Red circle, then middle not peaceful, for troops; Blue circle, for worry floods; Black circle, for illness, many die; Yellow circle, then auspicious. Red horns offend my city, yellow horns land dispute, white horns weeping crying sound, blue horns have troops worry, black horns then floods. Intent, conduct exhausted troops place ends. Five stars same color, all under heaven ceases troops, hundred surnames peaceful prosperous. Spring wind autumn rain, winter cold summer heat, move shake constantly with this.

sentences.zh: 填星出百二十日而逆西行，西行百二十日反東行。

translations.literal: Tianxing emerges and after one hundred twenty days moves contrary westward, after going west one hundred twenty days returns and goes east.

sentences.zh: 見三百三十日而入，入三十日復出東方。

translations.literal: Appears for three hundred thirty days then enters, after entering thirty days emerges again in the east.

sentences.zh: 太歲在甲寅，鎮星在東壁，故在營室。

translations.literal: The great year is in Jiayin, Zhenxing is in Dongbi, thus in Yingshi.

Tian Xing out hundred twenty days then contrary west goes, west goes hundred twenty days returns east goes. Appears three hundred thirty days then enters, enters thirty days again out eastern. Great year in Jia Yin, Zhen Xing in Dong Bi, thus in Ying Shi.
Observe the sun's movement to position Taibai.

sentences.zh: 曰西方，秋，（司兵月行及天矢）日庚、辛，主殺。

translations.literal: It is called Western, governs autumn, troops, monthly conduct and heavenly arrow, called Geng and Xin, governs killing.
When killing is lost, punishment emerges from Taibai.
When Taibai loses its conduct, its lodgings determine the state's fate.

sentences.zh: 其出行十八舍二百四十日而入。

translations.literal: Its outward conduct through eighteen lodgings, two hundred forty days, then enters.

sentences.zh: 入東方，伏行十一舍百三十日；

translations.literal: Enters eastern, hidden goes eleven lodges hundred thirty days;
translations.idiomatic: Enters the east, travels hidden through eleven lodgings, one hundred thirty days.

sentences.zh: 其入西方，伏行三舍十六日而出。

translations.literal: Its entry into the west travels hidden through three lodgings, sixteen days, then emerges.

sentences.zh: 當出不出，當入不入，是謂失舍，不有破軍，必有國君之篡。

translations.literal: When it should emerge but does not, should enter but does not, this is called losing the lodging—not having broken army, must have state lord's usurpation.

Observe sun conduct to place position Tai Bai. Called western, autumn, governs troops month conduct and heaven arrow, called Geng Xin, governs kill. Kill lost, punishment exits Tai Bai. Tai Bai loses conduct, with its lodges determines state. Its out conduct eighteen lodges two hundred forty days then enters. Enters eastern, hidden goes eleven lodges hundred thirty days; Its enters western, hidden goes three lodges sixteen days then out. Should out not out, should enter not enter, this called loses lodge, not has broken army, must has state lord usurpation.

sentences.zh: 其紀上元，以攝提格之歲，與營室晨出東方，至角而入；

translations.literal: Its record upper yuan, with She Ti Ge year, with Ying Shi morning out eastern, to Jue then enters;
translations.idiomatic: Its record of the upper yuan, using the Sheti Ge year, emerges in the morning with Yingshi in the east, enters at Jue.

sentences.zh: 與營室夕出西方，至角而入；

translations.literal: With Ying Shi evening out western, to Jue then enters;
translations.idiomatic: Emerges in the evening with Yingshi in the west, enters at Jue.

translations.literal: With Jue morning out, enters Bi;
translations.idiomatic: Emerges in the morning with Jue, enters at Bi.

translations.literal: With Jue evening out, enters Bi;
translations.idiomatic: Emerges in the evening with Jue, enters at Bi.

translations.literal: With Bi morning out, enters Ji;
translations.idiomatic: Emerges in the morning with Bi, enters at Ji.

translations.literal: With Bi evening out, enters Ji;
translations.idiomatic: Emerges in the evening with Bi, enters at Ji.

translations.literal: With Ji morning out, enters Liu;
translations.idiomatic: Emerges in the morning with Ji, enters at Liu.

translations.literal: With Ji evening out, enters Liu;
translations.idiomatic: Emerges in the evening with Ji, enters at Liu.

translations.literal: With Liu morning out, enters Ying Shi;
translations.idiomatic: Emerges in the morning with Liu, enters at Yingshi.

translations.literal: Emerges in the evening with Liu, enters at Yingshi.

sentences.zh: 凡出入東西各五，為八歲，二百二十日，復與營室晨出東方。

translations.literal: Generally, five entries and exits each in east and west make eight years, two hundred twenty days, then emerges again in the morning with Yingshi in the east.
Its general rate: the year circles heaven.

sentences.zh: 其始出東方，行遲，率日半度，一百二十日，必逆行一二舍；

translations.literal: Its begins out eastern, goes slow, rate day half degree, hundred twenty days, must contrary goes one two lodges;
translations.idiomatic: Its beginning emergence in the east goes slowly, at a rate of half a degree per day, after one hundred twenty days must move contrary by one or two lodgings.

sentences.zh: 上極而反，東行，行日一度半，一百二十日入。

translations.literal: Rises to the extreme and returns, goes east at one and a half degrees per day, enters after one hundred twenty days.
Its low, near sun, called Ming Xing, soft;
translations.idiomatic: When low and near the sun, called Mingxing, soft.

translations.literal: When high and far from the sun, called Daxiao, hard.

sentences.zh: 其始出西［方］，行疾，率日一度半，百二十日；

translations.literal: Its begins out western, goes urgent, rate day one degree half, hundred twenty days;
translations.idiomatic: Its beginning emergence in the west goes urgently, at a rate of one and a half degrees per day, for one hundred twenty days.

sentences.zh: 上極而行遲，日半度，百二十日，旦入，必逆行一二舍而入。

translations.literal: Rises to the extreme then goes slowly, half a degree per day, after one hundred twenty days enters at dawn, must move contrary by one or two lodgings then enters.
Its low, near sun, called Da Bai, soft;
translations.idiomatic: When low and near the sun, called Dabai, soft.

translations.literal: When high and far from the sun, called Daxiang, hard.
Emerges with Chen and Xu, enters with Chou and Wei.

Its record upper yuan, with She Ti Ge year, with Ying Shi morning out eastern, to Jue then enters; With Ying Shi evening out western, to Jue then enters; With Jue morning out, enters Bi; With Jue evening out, enters Bi; With Bi morning out, enters Ji; With Bi evening out, enters Ji; With Ji morning out, enters Liu; With Ji evening out, enters Liu; With Liu morning out, enters Ying Shi; With Liu evening out, enters Ying Shi. Generally enter exit east west each five, for eight years, two hundred twenty days, again with Ying Shi morning out eastern. Its great rate, year circles heaven. Its begins out eastern, goes slow, rate day half degree, hundred twenty days, must contrary goes one two lodges; Rises extreme then returns, east goes, goes day one degree half, hundred twenty days enters. Its low, near sun, called Ming Xing, soft; High, far sun, called Da Xiao, hard. Its begins out western, goes urgent, rate day one degree half, hundred twenty days; Rises extreme then goes slow, day half degree, hundred twenty days, dawn enters, must contrary goes one two lodges then enters. Its low, near sun, called Da Bai, soft; High, far sun, called Da Xiang, hard. Out with Chen Xu, enters with Chou Wei.

sentences.zh: 當出不出，未當入而入，天下偃兵，兵在外，入。

translations.literal: When it should emerge but does not, should not enter but does, all under heaven ceases troops; when troops are outside, enters.

sentences.zh: 未當出而出，當入而不入，［天］下起兵，有破國。

translations.literal: When it should not emerge but does, should enter but does not, below raises troops, has broken state.
When it emerges at the proper period, its state prospers.

sentences.zh: 其出東為東，入東為北方；

translations.literal: Its out east for east, enters east for northern;
translations.idiomatic: When it emerges east it is eastern, when it enters east it is northern.

translations.literal: When it emerges west it is western, when it enters west it is southern.
Its dwells long, its region benefits;
translations.idiomatic: When it dwells long, its region benefits.

translations.literal: When it moves easily, its region is inauspicious.

Should out not out, not should enter and enter, all under heaven ceases troops, troops outside, enter. Not should out and out, should enter and not enter, below raises troops, has broken state. Its should period out, its state prosperous. Its out east for east, enters east for northern; Out west for west, enters west for southern. Its dwells long, its region benefits; Easy, its region inauspicious.

sentences.zh: 出西（逆行）至東，正西國吉。

translations.literal: Emerging west and moving contrary to the east, precisely western states are auspicious.
Emerging east and going to the west, precisely eastern states are auspicious.
Its out not passes heaven;
translations.idiomatic: Its emergence does not pass through heaven.

translations.literal: When it passes through heaven, all under heaven reforms governance.

Out west contrary goes to east, precisely western states auspicious. Out east to west, precisely eastern states auspicious. Its out not passes heaven; Passes heaven, all under heaven reforms governance.
When small with horns moving, troops arise.
Begins out great, after small, troops weak;
translations.idiomatic: Beginning emergence large, afterwards small, troops weak.

translations.literal: Emergence small, afterwards large, troops strong.
Out high, use troops deep auspicious, shallow inauspicious;
translations.idiomatic: Emergence high, using troops deep is auspicious, shallow is inauspicious.

translations.literal: When low, shallow is auspicious, deep is inauspicious.

sentences.zh: 日方南金居其南，日方北金居其北，曰贏，侯王不寧，用兵進吉退凶。

translations.literal: When sun is in south and metal dwells its south, sun is in north and metal dwells its north, called advancing—marquises and kings are not peaceful, using troops advancing is auspicious, retreating inauspicious.

sentences.zh: 日方南金居其北，日方北金居其南，曰縮，侯王有憂，用兵退吉進凶。

translations.literal: When sun is in south and metal dwells its north, sun is in north and metal dwells its south, called retreating—marquises and kings have worries, using troops retreating is auspicious, advancing inauspicious.

sentences.zh: 用兵象太白：太白行疾，疾行；

translations.literal: Use troops imitate Tai Bai: Tai Bai goes urgent, urgent go;
translations.idiomatic: Using troops imitates Taibai: when Taibai goes urgently, go urgently.

translations.literal: When slow, go slowly.
Horns dare to battle.
Movement and shaking are restless.
Circular and still means still.
Follow horns pointed, auspicious;
translations.idiomatic: Following where horns point is auspicious.

translations.literal: Contrary to it, all inauspicious.
When emerging, send out troops; when entering, bring in troops.
Red horns, have battle;
translations.idiomatic: Red horns have battle.

translations.literal: White horns, have mourning;
translations.idiomatic: White horns have mourning.

translations.literal: Black circle horns, worry, has water affairs;
translations.idiomatic: Black circular horns bring worry, have water affairs.

translations.literal: Blue circle small horns, worry, has wood affairs;
translations.idiomatic: Blue circular small horns bring worry, have wood affairs.

translations.literal: Yellow circular harmony horns have earth affairs, have year.

sentences.zh: 其已出三日而復，有微入，入三日乃復盛出，是謂耎，其下國有軍敗將北。

translations.literal: When it has been out for three days and returns, with a slight inward movement, enters for three days then emerges flourishing again, this is called soft—the state below it suffers military defeat and its generals flee north.

sentences.zh: 其已入三日又復微出，出三日而復盛入，其下國有憂；

translations.literal: Its already entered three days again slight out, out three days then flourishing enter, its below state has worry;
translations.idiomatic: When it has entered for three days but emerges slightly again, emerges for three days then enters flourishingly, the state below it faces worry;

sentences.zh: 師有糧食兵革，遺人用之；

translations.literal: Commander has grain army armor, abandons people use it;
translations.idiomatic: Its commanders will leave behind grain, weapons, and armor for others to use;

translations.literal: Though their troops are numerous, their generals will be taken captive.
Its out west loses conduct, outer states defeated;
translations.idiomatic: When it emerges westward and loses its proper course, foreign states suffer defeat;

translations.literal: When it emerges eastward and loses its proper course, central states suffer defeat.

sentences.zh: 其色大圜黃滜，可為好事；

translations.literal: Its color great circle yellow turbid, can do good affairs;
translations.idiomatic: When its color is a great yellow circle, turbid, it can accomplish good deeds;

translations.literal: When its circle is greatly red, troops flourish but do not battle.

Small with horns move, troops arise. Begins out great, after small, troops weak; Out small, after great, troops strong. Out high, use troops deep auspicious, shallow inauspicious; Low, shallow auspicious, deep inauspicious. Sun square south metal dwells its south, sun square north metal dwells its north, called advance, marquises kings not peaceful, use troops advance auspicious retreat inauspicious. Sun square south metal dwells its north, sun square north metal dwells its south, called retreat, marquises kings have worry, use troops retreat auspicious advance inauspicious. Use troops imitate Tai Bai: Tai Bai goes urgent, urgent go; Slow, slow go. Horns, dare battle. Move shake restless, restless. Circle with still, still. Follow horns pointed, auspicious; Contrary, all inauspicious. Out then out troops, enter then enter troops. Red horns, have battle; White horns, have mourning; Black circle horns, worry, has water affairs; Blue circle small horns, worry, has wood affairs; Yellow circle harmony horns, has earth affairs, has year. Its already out three days then returns, has slight enter, enters three days then again flourishing out, this called soft, its below state has army defeated general flees north. Its already entered three days again slight out, out three days then flourishing enter, its below state has worry; Commander has grain army armor, abandons people use it; Though troops numerous, general becomes person captive. Its out west loses conduct, outer states defeated; Its out east loses conduct, central states defeated. Its color great circle yellow turbid, can do good affairs; Its circle great red, troops flourish not battle.
Tai Bai white, compares Wolf;
translations.idiomatic: Tai Bai appears white, like the Wolf star;

translations.literal: Red, compares Xin;
translations.idiomatic: Appears red, like the Heart star;

translations.literal: Yellow, compares Shen left shoulder;
translations.idiomatic: Appears yellow, like the left shoulder of Shen;

translations.literal: Blue, compares Shen right shoulder;
translations.idiomatic: Appears blue, like the right shoulder of Shen;

translations.literal: Appears black, like the great star of Kui.

sentences.zh: 五星皆從太白而聚乎一舍，其下之國可以兵從天下。

translations.literal: When the five stars all follow Tai Bai and gather in one lodge, the state below it can conquer all under heaven with its troops.
Dwells solid, has obtain;
translations.idiomatic: When it dwells in solid places, there are gains;

translations.literal: When it dwells in empty places, there are no gains.

sentences.zh: 行勝色，色勝位，有位勝無位，有色勝無色，行得盡勝之。

translations.literal: Movement overcomes color, color overcomes position, having position overcomes not having position, having color overcomes not having color, movement that achieves everything overcomes them all.

sentences.zh: 出而留桑榆閒，疾其下國。

translations.literal: When it emerges and stays between Sang and Yu, it brings illness to the state below it.

sentences.zh: 上而疾，未盡其日，過參天，疾其對國。

translations.literal: When it rises urgently without completing its days, passes through Shen in heaven, it brings illness to the state facing it.
Rises then descends, descends then rises—there will be rebellious generals.
When it enters the moon, generals will be disgraced.

sentences.zh: 金、木星合，光，其下戰不合，兵雖起而不鬬；

translations.literal: Gold wood stars combine, light, its below battle not combine, troops though rise not fight;
translations.idiomatic: When the gold and wood stars combine with light, battles below them will not unite, troops may rise but will not fight;

translations.literal: When they combine and mutually destroy each other, there will be broken armies in the fields.

sentences.zh: 出西方，昏而出陰，陰兵彊；

translations.literal: Out western, dusk out yin, yin troops strong;
translations.idiomatic: Emerging in the west, emerging at dusk in yin, yin troops are strong;

translations.literal: Evening meal out, small weak;
translations.idiomatic: Emerging at evening meal, slightly weak;

translations.literal: Night half out, middle weak;
translations.idiomatic: Emerging at midnight, moderately weak;

sentences.zh: 雞鳴出，大弱：是謂陰陷於陽。

translations.literal: Chicken crow out, great weak: this called yin traps at yang.
translations.idiomatic: Emerging at cockcrow, greatly weak: this is called yin trapped by yang.

sentences.zh: 其在東方，乘明而出陽，陽兵之彊，雞鳴出，小弱；

translations.literal: Its in eastern, rides bright out yang, yang troops strong, chicken crow out, small weak;
translations.idiomatic: When it is in the east, riding brightness and emerging in yang, yang troops are strong, emerging at cockcrow, slightly weak;

translations.literal: Night half out, middle weak;
translations.idiomatic: Emerging at midnight, moderately weak;

sentences.zh: 昏出，大弱：是謂陽陷於陰。

translations.literal: Dusk out, great weak: this called yang traps at yin.
translations.idiomatic: Emerging at dusk, greatly weak: this is called yang trapped by yin.

sentences.zh: 太白伏也，以出兵，兵有殃。

translations.literal: When Tai Bai is hidden, sending out troops brings calamity to the troops.
Its out Mao south, south overcomes north;
translations.idiomatic: When it emerges south of Mao, the south overcomes the north;

translations.literal: Out Mao north, north overcomes south;
translations.idiomatic: When it emerges north of Mao, the north overcomes the south;

translations.literal: When it is precisely at Mao, eastern states benefit.
Out You north, north overcomes south;
translations.idiomatic: When it emerges north of You, the north overcomes the south;

translations.literal: Out You south, south overcomes north;
translations.idiomatic: When it emerges south of You, the south overcomes the north;

translations.literal: When it is precisely at You, western states are victorious.

Tai Bai white, compares Wolf; Red, compares Xin; Yellow, compares Shen left shoulder; Blue, compares Shen right shoulder; Black, compares Kui great star. Five stars all follow Tai Bai and gather at one lodge, its below state can with troops follow all under heaven. Dwells solid, has obtain; Dwells empty, no obtain. Conduct overcomes color, color overcomes position, has position overcomes no position, has color overcomes no color, conduct gets all overcomes them. Out and stays Sang Yu between, sickens its below state. Rises and urgent, not exhaust its day, passes Shen heaven, sickens its facing state. Rises again down, down again rises, has contrary general. Its enters moon, general will shame. Gold wood stars combine, light, its below battle not combine, troops though rise not fight; Combine mutually destroy, fields have broken army. Out western, dusk out yin, yin troops strong; Evening meal out, small weak; Night half out, middle weak; Chicken crow out, great weak: this called yin traps at yang. Its in eastern, rides bright out yang, yang troops strong, chicken crow out, small weak; Night half out, middle weak; Dusk out, great weak: this called yang traps at yin. Tai Bai hides, with out troops, troops have calamity. Its out Mao south, south overcomes north; Out Mao north, north overcomes south; Precisely at Mao, eastern states benefit. Out You north, north overcomes south; Out You south, south overcomes north; Precisely at You, western states victorious.
Its with column stars mutually offend, small battle;
translations.idiomatic: When it offends the column stars, there will be small battles;

translations.literal: When it offends the five stars, there will be great battles.

sentences.zh: 其相犯，太白出其南，南國敗；

translations.literal: Its mutually offend, Tai Bai out its south, southern states defeated;
translations.idiomatic: When they mutually offend, if Tai Bai emerges south of them, southern states are defeated;

translations.literal: If it emerges north of them, northern states are defeated.
Goes urgent, martial;
translations.idiomatic: When it moves urgently, it signifies martial affairs;

translations.literal: When it does not move, it signifies civil affairs.

sentences.zh: 色白五芒，出蚤為月蝕，晚為天夭及彗星，將發其國。

translations.literal: When its color is white with five spikes, emerging early signifies lunar eclipse, late signifies premature deaths in heaven and comets, generals will attack their own states.

sentences.zh: 出東為德，舉事左之迎之，吉。

translations.literal: Emerging in the east signifies virtue, raise affairs to the left to welcome it, auspicious.

sentences.zh: 出西為刑，舉事右之背之，吉。

translations.literal: Emerging in the west signifies punishment, raise affairs to the right to oppose it, auspicious.
Doing the contrary is all inauspicious.
When Tai Bai's light appears as a shadow, battles will be victorious.

sentences.zh: 晝見而經天，是謂爭明，彊國弱，小國彊，女主昌。

translations.literal: When it is seen by day and passes through heaven, this is called contending with brightness—strong states weaken, small states strengthen, female rulers prosper.

Its with column stars mutually offend, small battle; Five stars, great battle. Its mutually offend, Tai Bai out its south, southern states defeated; Out its north, northern states defeated. Goes urgent, martial; Not goes, civil. Color white five spikes, out early for moon eclipse, late for heaven premature and comet, general sends its state. Out east for virtue, raise affairs left it meets it, auspicious. Out west for punishment, raise affairs right it backs it, auspicious. Contrary all inauspicious. Tai Bai light appears shadow, battle victorious. Day sees and passes heaven, this called contend bright, strong states weak, small states strong, female lord prospers.
Kang is the sparse temple, Tai Bai's temple.
Tai Bai is the great minister, its title is Upper Duke.

sentences.zh: 其他名殷星、太正、營星、觀星、宮星、明星、大衰、大澤、終星、大相、天浩、序星、月緯。

translations.literal: Its other names are Yin Star, Tai Zheng, Ying Star, Guan Star, Gong Star, Ming Star, Da Shuai, Da Ze, Zhong Star, Da Xiang, Tian Hao, Xu Star, Yue Wei.
The Grand Marshal carefully observes this.

Kang is sparse temple, Tai Bai temple. Tai Bai, great minister, its title upper duke. Other names Yin Star, Tai Zheng, Ying Star, Guan Star, Gong Star, Ming Star, Da Shuai, Da Ze, Zhong Star, Da Xiang, Tian Hao, Xu Star, Yue Wei. Great Marshal position carefully waits this.

sentences.zh: 察日辰之會，以治辰星之位。

translations.literal: Observe the conjunctions of sun and Chen to determine Chen Star's position.

sentences.zh: 曰北方水，太陰之精，主冬，日壬、癸。

translations.literal: It is called northern water, the essence of Tai Yin, governs winter, corresponds to Ren and Gui.

sentences.zh: 刑失者，罰出辰星，以其宿命國。

translations.literal: When punishments are lost, Chen Star appears as punishment, determining the fate of states by its lodgings.

Observe sun Chen meeting, to govern Chen Star position. Called northern water, Tai Yin essence, governs winter, called Ren, Gui. Punishment lost, punishment exits Chen Star, with its lodge determines state.

sentences.zh: 是正四時：仲春春分，夕出郊奎、婁、胃東五舍，為齊；

translations.literal: This rectifies four seasons: mid spring spring equinox, evening out suburbs Kui Lou Wei east five lodges, for Qi;
translations.idiomatic: This rectifies the four seasons: Mid-spring at spring equinox, emerging in the evening through the suburbs Kui, Lou, Wei in five eastern lodges, for Qi;

sentences.zh: 仲夏夏至，夕出郊東井、輿鬼、柳東七舍，為楚；

translations.literal: Mid summer summer solstice, evening out suburbs Dong Jing Yu Gui Liu east seven lodges, for Chu;
translations.idiomatic: Mid-summer at summer solstice, emerging in the evening through the suburbs Dong Jing, Yu Gui, Liu in seven eastern lodges, for Chu;

sentences.zh: 仲秋秋分，夕出郊角、亢、氐、房東四舍，為漢；

translations.literal: Mid autumn autumn equinox, evening out suburbs Jue Kang Di Fang east four lodges, for Han;
translations.idiomatic: Mid-autumn at autumn equinox, emerging in the evening through the suburbs Jue, Kang, Di, Fang in four eastern lodges, for Han;

sentences.zh: 仲冬冬至，晨出郊東方，與尾、箕、斗、牽牛俱西，為中國。
