translations.literal: Mid-winter at winter solstice, emerging in the morning in the eastern suburbs, together with Wei, Ji, Dou, Qian Niu going west, for the central states.
Its appearances and disappearances constantly follow Chen, Xu, Chou, Wei.

This rectifies four seasons: mid spring spring equinox, evening out suburbs Kui Lou Wei east five lodges, for Qi; Mid summer summer solstice, evening out suburbs Dong Jing Yu Gui Liu east seven lodges, for Chu; Mid autumn autumn equinox, evening out suburbs Jue Kang Di Fang east four lodges, for Han; Mid winter winter solstice, morning out suburbs eastern, with Wei Ji Dou Qian Niu together west, for central states. Its enter exit constantly with Chen Xu Chou Wei.
Its early, for moon eclipse;
translations.idiomatic: When it appears early, it signifies lunar eclipse;

translations.literal: When it appears late, it signifies comets and premature deaths in heaven.

sentences.zh: 其時宜效不效為失，追兵在外不戰。

translations.literal: When it should appear at the proper time but does not, this is lost, pursuing troops outside will not battle.
One season not out, its season not harmonious;
translations.idiomatic: If it does not appear for one season, that season will be inharmonious;

translations.literal: If it does not appear for four seasons, all under heaven will suffer great famine.

sentences.zh: 其當效而出也，色白為旱，黃為五穀熟，赤為兵，黑為水。

translations.literal: When it should appear and does appear, white color signifies drought, yellow signifies the five grains ripening, red signifies troops, black signifies water.

sentences.zh: 出東方，大而白，有兵於外，解。

translations.literal: Emerging in the east, large and white, there are troops outside that will be resolved.
Constantly in eastern, its red, central states victorious;
translations.idiomatic: Constantly in the east, red, central states are victorious;

translations.literal: When it turns west and red, outer states benefit.
When there are no troops outside but it appears red, troops will arise.

sentences.zh: 其與太白俱出東方，皆赤而角，外國大敗，中國勝；

translations.literal: Its with Tai Bai together out eastern, both red and horns, outer states greatly defeated, central states victorious;
translations.idiomatic: When it and Tai Bai both emerge in the east, both red with horns, outer states greatly defeated, central states victorious;

sentences.zh: 其與太白俱出西方，皆赤而角，外國利。

translations.literal: When it and Tai Bai both emerge in the west, both red with horns, outer states benefit.

sentences.zh: 五星分天之中，積于東方，中國利；

translations.literal: Five stars divide heaven midst, accumulate at eastern, central states benefit;
translations.idiomatic: When the five stars divide heaven's center, accumulating in the east, central states benefit;

sentences.zh: 積于西方，外國用［兵］者利。

translations.literal: Accumulating in the west, those outer states using troops will benefit.

sentences.zh: 五星皆從辰星而聚于一舍，其所捨之國可以法致天下。

translations.literal: When all five stars follow Chen Star and gather in one lodge, the state of its lodge can bring all under heaven under its rule by law.
Chen Star not out, Tai Bai as guest;
translations.idiomatic: When Chen Star does not appear, Tai Bai acts as guest;

translations.literal: When it appears, Tai Bai acts as host.

sentences.zh: 出而與太白不相從，野雖有軍，不戰。

translations.literal: When it emerges but does not follow Tai Bai, though there are armies in the fields, they will not battle.
Out eastern, Tai Bai out western;
translations.idiomatic: Emerging in the east, Tai Bai emerges in the west;

sentences.zh: 若出西方，太白出東方，為格，野雖有兵不戰。

translations.literal: If emerging in the west, Tai Bai emerges in the east, this is called Ge, though there are troops in the fields, they will not battle.

sentences.zh: 失其時而出，為當寒反溫，當溫反寒。

translations.literal: When it loses its proper time and appears, it causes should-be-cold to become warm contrary, should-be-warm to become cold contrary.

sentences.zh: 當出不出，是謂擊卒，兵大起。

translations.literal: When it should appear but does not, this is called striking troops, great troop risings occur.

sentences.zh: 其入太白中而上出，破軍殺將，客軍勝；

translations.literal: Its enters Tai Bai midst and rises out, breaks army kills general, guest army victorious;
translations.idiomatic: When it enters Tai Bai's midst and emerges upward, armies are broken and generals killed, guest armies are victorious;

translations.literal: When it emerges downward, guest armies lose territory.

sentences.zh: 辰星來抵太白，太白不去，將死。

translations.literal: When Chen Star comes opposing Tai Bai, if Tai Bai does not move, generals will die.

sentences.zh: 正旗上出，破軍殺將，客勝；

translations.literal: Straight flag rises out, breaks army kills general, guest victorious;
translations.idiomatic: When it emerges upward from the straight flag, armies are broken and generals killed, guest armies victorious;

translations.literal: When it emerges downward, guest armies lose territory.
Observe where the flag points to determine where armies will be broken.

sentences.zh: 其繞環太白，若與鬬，大戰，客勝。

translations.literal: When it circles around Tai Bai as if fighting, there will be great battle, guest armies victorious.

sentences.zh: 兔過太白，閒可椷劍，小戰，客勝。

translations.literal: When the rabbit passes Tai Bai, the space between them can measure a sword, small battle, guest armies victorious.
Rabbit dwells Tai Bai front, army stops;
translations.idiomatic: When the rabbit dwells in front of Tai Bai, armies cease;

translations.literal: Out Tai Bai left, small battle;
translations.idiomatic: Emerging to Tai Bai's left, small battle;

sentences.zh: 摩太白，有數萬人戰，主人吏死；

translations.literal: Grinds Tai Bai, has several ten thousand people battle, host officials die;
translations.idiomatic: When it grinds against Tai Bai, battles of tens of thousands, host officials die;

sentences.zh: 出太白右，去三尺，軍急約戰。

translations.literal: Emerging to Tai Bai's right, going three chi away, armies urgently engage in close battle.
Blue horns, troops worry;
translations.idiomatic: Blue horns bring worry to troops;

translations.literal: Black horns bring water.
Red signifies the end of exhausted troops.

Its early, for moon eclipse; Late, for comet and heaven premature. Its time should appear not appear for lost, pursuing troops outside not battle. One season not out, its season not harmonious; Four seasons not out, all under heaven great famine. sentences.zh: 兔七命，曰小正、辰星、天欃、安周星、細爽、能星、鉤星。

translations.literal: The rabbit has seven names: Xiao Zheng, Chen Xing, Tian Chan, An Zhou Xing, Xi Shuang, Neng Xing, Gou Xing.

sentences.zh: 其色黃而小，出而易處，天下之文變而不善矣。

translations.literal: When its color is yellow and small, emerging and easily positioned, the culture of all under heaven changes but not for the good.

sentences.zh: 兔五色，青圜憂，白圜喪，赤圜中不平，黑圜吉。

translations.literal: The rabbit in five colors: blue circle brings worry, white circle brings mourning, red circle brings internal unrest, black circle is auspicious.

sentences.zh: 赤角犯我城，黃角地之爭，白角號泣之聲。

translations.literal: Red horns offend my city, yellow horns bring territorial disputes, white horns bring sounds of weeping and wailing.

Rabbit seven names, called Xiao Zheng, Chen Xing, Tian Chan, An Zhou Xing, Xi Shuang, Neng Xing, Gou Xing. Its color yellow and small, out and easy place, all under heaven culture changes and not good. Rabbit five colors, blue circle worry, white circle mourning, red circle middle not peaceful, black circle auspicious. Red horns offend my city, yellow horns land dispute, white horns crying calling sound.

sentences.zh: 其出東方，行四舍四十八日，其數二十日，而反入于東方；

translations.literal: Its out eastern, goes four lodges forty eight days, its number twenty days, then returns enters at eastern;
translations.idiomatic: When it emerges in the east, traveling four lodges in forty-eight days, its count is twenty days, then it returns and enters in the east;

sentences.zh: 其出西方，行四舍四十八日，其數二十日，而反入于西方。

translations.literal: When it emerges in the west, traveling four lodges in forty-eight days, its count is twenty days, then it returns and enters in the west.

sentences.zh: 其一候之營室、角、畢、箕、柳。

translations.literal: Its one station is Ying Shi, Jue, Bi, Ji, Liu.
Emerging between Fang and Xin causes earthquakes.

Its out eastern, goes four lodges forty eight days, its number twenty days, then returns enters at eastern; Its out western, goes four lodges forty eight days, its number twenty days, then returns enters at western. Its one waits Ying Shi, Jue, Bi, Ji, Liu. Out Fang Xin between, earth moves.
Chen Xing color: spring, blue yellow;
translations.idiomatic: Chen Xing's colors: in spring, blue-yellow;

translations.literal: Summer, red white;
translations.idiomatic: In summer, red-white;

translations.literal: Autumn, blue white, and year ripe;
translations.idiomatic: In autumn, blue-white, and the year's harvest is good;

translations.literal: In winter, yellow but not bright.
If it changes its color, that time will not prosper.
If not seen in spring, great winds come, and autumn brings no fruit.

sentences.zh: 夏不見，有六十日之旱，月蝕。

translations.literal: If not seen in summer, there are sixty days of drought and lunar eclipse.
If not seen in autumn, there are troops, and spring brings no birth.

sentences.zh: 冬不見，陰雨六十日，有流邑，夏則不長。

translations.literal: If not seen in winter, yin rains for sixty days with flowing cities, and summer brings no growth.

Chen Xing color: spring, blue yellow; Summer, red white; Autumn, blue white, and year ripe; Winter, yellow and not bright. If changes its color, its time not prosperous. Spring not see, great wind, autumn then not real. Summer not see, has sixty days drought, month eclipse. Autumn not see, has troops, spring then not born. Winter not see, yin rain sixty days, has flowing cities, summer then not grow.

Fang, Xin correspond to Yu Province.
Wei, Ji correspond to You Province.
Dou corresponds to Jiang and Hu.
Qian Niu, Wu Nu correspond to Yang Province.
Xu, Wei correspond to Qing Province.

Zi Xi, Shen correspond to Yi Province.
Dong Jing, Yu Gui correspond to Yong Province.
Liu, Seven Stars, Zhang correspond to the Three He regions.
Yi, Zhen correspond to Jing Province.

sentences.zh: 七星為員官，辰星廟，蠻夷星也。

translations.literal: Seven Stars forms the round official, Chen Xing's temple, star of the barbarian Yi.
Seven Stars for round official, Chen Xing temple, barbarian Yi star.
Two armies oppose, sun halo;
translations.idiomatic: When two armies oppose each other, the sun shows halos;

translations.literal: Halo equal, strength balanced;
translations.idiomatic: Equal halos mean balanced strength;

translations.literal: Thick long great, has victory;
translations.idiomatic: Thick, long, great ones bring victory;

translations.literal: Thin, short, small ones bring no victory.
Heavy embrace brings great defeat to none.

sentences.zh: 抱為和，背［為］不和，為分離相去。

translations.literal: Embrace signifies harmony, opposition signifies disharmony, separation and departure.
Straight for self establish, establish marquises kings;
translations.idiomatic: Straight signifies self-establishment, establishing marquises and kings;

translations.literal: Broken army, as if killing generals.
Negative and carrying bring joy.
Surround in middle, middle victorious;
translations.idiomatic: Surrounding in the middle, the middle is victorious;

translations.literal: Surrounding on the outside, the outside is victorious.
Blue outer red middle, with harmony depart;
translations.idiomatic: Blue outside red inside signifies harmonious departure;

translations.literal: Red outside blue inside signifies evil departure.

sentences.zh: 氣暈先至而後去，居軍勝。

translations.literal: When qi halos arrive first then depart, garrison armies are victorious.
First arrives first goes, front beneficial back ill;
translations.idiomatic: Arriving first and departing first brings benefit first then illness;

translations.literal: Later arrives later goes, front ill back beneficial;
translations.idiomatic: Arriving later and departing later brings illness first then benefit;

sentences.zh: 後至先去，前後皆病，居軍不勝。

translations.literal: Arriving later and departing first brings illness to both front and back, garrison armies not victorious.

sentences.zh: 見而去，其發疾，雖勝無功。

translations.literal: Appearing then departing, its dispatch is urgent, though victorious brings no merit.
Appearing more than half a day brings great merit.

sentences.zh: 白虹屈短，上下兌，有者下大流血。

translations.literal: White rainbow bent and short, top and bottom exchange, below there is great bloodshed.

sentences.zh: 日暈制勝，近期三十日，遠期六十日。

translations.literal: Sun halos determine victory, near term thirty days, far term sixty days.

Two armies oppose, sun halo; Halo equal, strength balanced; Thick long great, has victory; Thin short small, no victory. Heavy embrace great defeat none. translations.idiomatic: Where it is eclipsed brings misfortune;

translations.literal: Again born, born place beneficial;
translations.idiomatic: Where it is reborn brings benefit;

translations.literal: When the eclipse grows more complete, it signifies the lord's position.

sentences.zh: 以其直及日所宿，加以日時，用命其國也。

translations.literal: Using its straight line and the sun's lodgings, adding the sun's time, to determine the fate of its state.

When the moon travels the middle path, there is peace and harmony.
Between yin brings much water and yin affairs.
Three chi north of outer brings yin star.
Three chi north brings great yin, great floods, troops.
Between yang brings arrogance and unruliness.
Yang star brings much violence and imprisonment.
Great yang brings great drought and mourning.

sentences.zh: 角、天門，十月為四月，十一月為五月，十二月為六月，水發，近三尺，遠五尺。

translations.literal: Horns, Heaven Gate: tenth month corresponds to fourth month, eleventh month to fifth month, twelfth month to sixth month, water rises, near three chi, far five chi.
Offending the four assistants executes assistant ministers.

sentences.zh: 行南北河，以陰陽言，旱水兵喪。

translations.literal: Going along the northern and southern rivers, speaking in terms of yin and yang: drought, floods, troops, mourning.

Moon goes middle path, peaceful harmonious. Yin between, much water, yin affairs. Outer north three chi, yin star. North three chi, great yin, great floods, troops. Yang between, arrogant unrestrained. Yang star, much violent prisons. Great yang, great drought mourning. Horns heaven gate, tenth month for fourth month, eleventh month for fifth month, twelfth month for sixth month, water sends, near three chi, far five chi. Offends four assistants, assistant ministers execute. Goes north south rivers, with yin yang speak, drought floods troops mourning.

sentences.zh: 月蝕歲星，其宿地，饑若亡。

translations.literal: When the moon eclipses the year star, famine threatens the land of its lodge.

sentences.zh: 熒惑也亂，填星也下犯上，太白也彊國以戰敗，辰星也女亂。

translations.literal: Ying Huo brings chaos, Tian Xing brings inferiors offending superiors, Tai Bai brings strong states defeated in battle, Chen Xing brings female disorder.
Eclipse great horns, governs fate bad it;
translations.idiomatic: Eclipse of great horns brings evil to those who govern fate;

translations.literal: Xin, then for inner traitor chaos;
translations.idiomatic: Xin brings inner traitor chaos;

translations.literal: Column stars bring worry to the land of their lodge.

Moon eclipses year star, its lodge land, famine if perishes. Ying Huo chaos, Tian Xing down offends up, Tai Bai strong state with battle defeated, Chen Xing female chaos. Eclipse great horns, governs fate bad it; Xin, then for inner traitor chaos; Column stars, its lodge land worry.

sentences.zh: 月食始日，五月者六，六月者五，五月復六，六月者一，而五月者五，凡百一十三月而復始。

translations.literal: Lunar eclipse begins on day: five months has six, six months has five, five months again has six, six months has one, and five months has five, altogether one hundred thirteen months then begins again.
Thus month eclipse, constant;
translations.idiomatic: Thus lunar eclipse is constant;

translations.literal: Solar eclipse signifies misfortune.

sentences.zh: 甲、乙，四海之外，日月不占。

translations.literal: Jia, Yi are beyond the four seas, sun and moon are not divined there.
Bing, Ding are Jiang, Huai, Hai, Dai.
Wu, Ji are central states, He, Ji.
Geng, Xin are west of Hua Mountain.
Ren, Gui are north of Heng Mountain.
Sun eclipse, state lord;
translations.idiomatic: Solar eclipse affects state lords;

translations.literal: Lunar eclipse affects opposing generals.

Month eclipse begins day, five months six, six months five, five months again six, six months one, and five months five, generally hundred thirteen months then returns begins. Thus month eclipse, constant; Sun eclipse, for not good. Jia Yi, four seas outside, sun moon not divine. Bing Ding, Jiang Huai Hai Dai. Wu Ji, central states He Ji. Geng Xin, Hua Shan west. Ren Gui, Heng Shan north. Sun eclipse, state lord; Month eclipse, general oppose it.

sentences.zh: 昭明星，大而白，無角，乍上乍下。

translations.literal: Bright morning star, large and white, without horns, suddenly up suddenly down.
The state where it emerges raises troops, much change.
Bright morning star, great and white, no horns, suddenly up suddenly down. Where out state, raise troops, much change.

sentences.zh: 五殘星，出正東東方之野。

translations.literal: Five remnant stars emerge precisely in the eastern wilderness.

sentences.zh: 其星狀類辰星，去地可六丈。

translations.literal: Their star shape resembles Chen Xing, about six zhang from the ground.
Five remnant stars, out precisely east eastern wild. Its star shape resembles Chen Xing, from ground can six zhang.

sentences.zh: 大賊星，出正南南方之野。

translations.literal: Great thief star emerges precisely in the southern wilderness.

sentences.zh: 星去地可六丈，大而赤，數動，有光。

translations.literal: Star about six zhang from ground, large and red, moves several times, has light.
Great thief star, out precisely south southern wild. Star from ground can six zhang, great and red, several moves, has light.

sentences.zh: 司危星，出正西西方之野。

translations.literal: Si Wei star emerges precisely in the western wilderness.

sentences.zh: 星去地可六丈，大而白，類太白。

translations.literal: Star about six zhang from ground, large and white, resembles Tai Bai.
Si Wei star, out precisely west western wild. Star from ground can six zhang, great and white, resembles Tai Bai.

sentences.zh: 獄漢星，出正北北方之野。

translations.literal: Yu Han star emerges precisely in the northern wilderness.

sentences.zh: 星去地可六丈，大而赤，數動，察之中青。

translations.literal: Star about six zhang from ground, large and red, moves several times, examine the middle is blue.

sentences.zh: 此四野星所出，出非其方，其下有兵，沖不利。

translations.literal: These four wilderness stars where they emerge, emerging not in their direction, below has troops, conflict unfavorable.

Yu Han star, out precisely north northern wild. Star from ground can six zhang, great and red, several moves, examine middle blue. This four wild stars where out, out not its direction, its below has troops, conflict unfavorable.

sentences.zh: 四填星，所出四隅，去地可四丈。

translations.literal: Four Tian stars emerge in the four corners, about four zhang from ground.
Four Tian stars, where out four corners, from ground can four zhang.

sentences.zh: 地維咸光，亦出四隅，去地可三丈，若月始出。

translations.literal: Earth dimension Xian Guang also emerges in four corners, about three zhang from ground, like the moon beginning to emerge.
Where appears, below has chaos;
translations.idiomatic: Where they appear, below has chaos;

translations.literal: Chaos perishes, those with virtue prosper.
Earth dimension Xian Guang, also out four corners, from ground can three zhang, like month begins out. Where appears, below has chaos; Chaos perish, has virtue prosper.

sentences.zh: 燭星，狀如太白，其出也不行。

translations.literal: Candle star shaped like Tai Bai, when it emerges it does not move.
Appears then extinguishes.
Where it illuminates, cities and towns fall into chaos.
Candle star, shape like Tai Bai, its out not goes. Appears then extinguishes. Where illuminates, city towns chaos.

sentences.zh: 如星非星，如雲非雲，命曰歸邪。

translations.literal: Like star not star, like cloud not cloud, named Gui Xie.
When Gui Xie emerges, there must be people returning to their state.
Like star not star, like cloud not cloud, named Gui Xie. Gui Xie out, must have return state people.

sentences.zh: 星者，金之散氣，［其］本曰火。

translations.literal: Stars are metal's scattered qi, its root is called fire.
Stars numerous, state auspicious;
translations.idiomatic: When stars are numerous, the state is auspicious;

translations.literal: When few, inauspicious.
Stars, metal scattered qi, its root called fire. Stars numerous, state auspicious; Few then inauspicious.

sentences.zh: 漢者，亦金之散氣，其本曰水。

translations.literal: The Milky Way is also metal's scattered qi, its root is called water.

sentences.zh: 漢，星多，多水，少則旱，其大經也。

translations.literal: Milky Way stars many bring much water, few bring drought—their great constant.
Milky Way, also metal scattered qi, its root called water. Milky Way, stars many, much water, few then drought, its great constant.

sentences.zh: 天鼓，有音如雷非雷，音在地而下及地。

translations.literal: Heaven Drum has a sound like thunder but not thunder, sound in the ground reaching down to earth.
Where it goes, troops are dispatched below.
Heaven Drum, has sound like thunder not thunder, sound in ground and down reaches ground. Its goes place, troops send its below.

sentences.zh: 天狗，狀如大奔星，有聲，其下止地，類狗。

translations.literal: Heaven Dog shaped like a great running star, has sound, stops on the ground below, resembles a dog.

sentences.zh: 所墮及，望之如火光炎炎沖天。
